properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the TextPreference (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: If true, converts straight quotes to typographic quotes.
properties.name: typographersQuotes

properties.description: If true, highlights hyphenation and justification rule violations in the text.
properties.name: highlightHjViolations

properties.description: If true, highlights paragraphs that violate keep options.
properties.name: highlightKeeps

properties.description: If true, highlights substituted glyphs.
properties.name: highlightSubstitutedGlyphs

properties.description: If true, highlights custom kerned or tracked characters.
properties.name: highlightCustomSpacing

properties.description: If true, highlights missing fonts.
properties.name: highlightSubstitutedFonts

properties.description: If true, automatically selects the correct optical size.
properties.name: useOpticalSize

properties.description: If true, applies the leading changes made to a text range to the entire paragraph. If false, applies leading changes only to the text range.
properties.name: useParagraphLeading

properties.description: The size of superscript characters, specified as a percentage of the font size. (Range: 0 to 200)
properties.name: superscriptSize

properties.description: The position of superscript characters, specified as a percentage of the regular leading. (Range: -500 to 500)
properties.name: superscriptPosition

properties.description: The size of subscript characters, specified as a percentage of the font size. (Range: 0 to 200)
properties.name: subscriptSize

properties.description: The position of subscript characters, specified as a percentage of the regular leading. (Range: -500 to 500)
properties.name: subscriptPosition

properties.description: The size of text formatted as small caps, specified as a percentage of the font size. (Range: 1 to 200)
properties.name: smallCap

properties.description: The amount that leading increases each time the user presses the option/alt-up arrow keys or decreases each time the user presses the option/alt-down arrow keys. (Range: .001 to 100)
properties.name: leadingKeyIncrement

properties.description: The amount that the baseline shift increases each time the user presses the option/alt-shift-up arrow keys or decreases each time the user presses the option/alt-shift-down arrow keys. (Range: .001 to 100)
properties.name: baselineShiftKeyIncrement

properties.description: The amount the kerning value per 1000 ems increases each time the user presses of the option/alt-right arrow keys or decreases each time the user presses the option/alt-left arrow keys. (Range: 1 to 100)
properties.name: kerningKeyIncrement

properties.description: If true, shows hidden characters.
properties.name: showInvisibles

properties.description: If true, justifies text around text wrap objects.
properties.name: justifyTextWraps

properties.description: If true, moves wrapped text to the next available leading increment below the text wrap objects (skip by leading).
properties.name: abutTextToTextWrap

properties.description: If true, text wrap does not affect text on layers above the layer that contains the text wrap object. If false, text wrap affects text on all visible layers.
properties.name: zOrderTextWrap

properties.description: If true, links placed text files and spreadsheet files. If false, embeds the files.
properties.name: linkTextFilesWhenImporting

properties.description: If true, uses on-screen highlighting to identify kinsoku.
properties.name: highlightKinsoku

properties.description: If true, Japanese composer treats quotes as half width and rotates them in vertical.
properties.name: quoteCharactersRotatedInVertical

properties.description: If true, reverses X and Y scaling on Roman characters in vertical text.
properties.name: useNewVerticalScaling

properties.description: If true, uses the glyph CID to get the mojikumi class of the character.
properties.name: useCidMojikumi

properties.description: If true, highlights character and paragraph styles with colored backgrounds.
properties.name: enableStylePreviewMode

properties.description: If true, enable automatic adding and deleting of pages in response to text reflow.
properties.name: smartTextReflow

properties.description: Specifies where to insert new pages in response to overset text.
properties.name: addPages

properties.description: Restrict the adding of pages during smart text reflow to overridden master text frames.
properties.name: limitToMasterTextFrames

properties.description: Preserve left-hand and right-and pages when facing pages are enabled during smart text reflow.
properties.name: preserveFacingPageSpreads

properties.description: Enable auto-deletion of pages containing empty threaded text frames.
properties.name: deleteEmptyPages

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
